dqm.jku.trustkg.blockchain.standardchain

Class BlockChain

  • java.lang.Object
    • dqm.jku.trustkg.blockchain.Chain
      • dqm.jku.trustkg.blockchain.standardchain.BlockChain
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MiniChain

    public class BlockChain
extends Chain
    Implementation for a standard blockchain, adapted from CryptoKass' tutorial https://medium.com/programmers-blockchain/create-simple-blockchain-java-tutorial-from-scratch-6eeed3cb03fa
    Author:
    optimusseptim

        Returns:

      • getPreviousHash

        public java.lang.String getPreviousHash()
        Gets the last calculated hash for adding a new block for instance
        Returns:
        String with the last hash, "0", if no block is in the chain
